import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' import ConnectComponent from '../../../connect' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox/index' import { UploadContent } from '@/actions/utils' class StepTwo extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], message: '', title: '', advance: false, buttons: false, background: false, foreground: false, FgImageUpload: true, FgImageUrl: false, ImageUpload: true, ImageUrl: false, upload: false, closeActionUrl: true, enterActionUrl: false, userFilePath: '', ui: { bg: { img: '', sc: '', clr: '', sw: 3, rd: 3, }, fg: { img: '', clr: '7', sc: '', sw: 0, rd: 0, }, ttl: { txt: '', clr: '', sz: '20', }, msg: { txt: '', clr: '', sz: '', }, img: '', appLink: '', btnOrig: 3, inAppButtons: [ { text: '', clr: '', bgc: '', sz: 12, appLink: '', }, ], }, } handleFileChange = async e => { const { files } = e.target if (files.length == 1) { const res = await UploadContent(files[0], 'media') if (res) { this.setState({ userFilePath: res.s3url, upload: true, }) } } } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } handleStateInputField = (key, value) => { let { ui } = this.state this.setState({ ui: _.set(ui, key, value), }) } render() { const { steps, message, title, advance, button, background, ImageUrl, ImageUpload, foreground, FgImageUpload, FgImageUrl, closeActionUrl, enterActionUrl, ui, } = this.state return (
Title* this.handleStateInputField('ttl.txt', e.currentTarget.value) } /> Message* this.handleStateInputField('msg.txt', e.currentTarget.value) } />
this.setState({ button: !button })} > Button {button && _.map(ui.inAppButtons, (btn, index) => (
this.handleStateInputField( `inAppButtons[${index}].text`, e.currentTarget.value ) } />
this.setState({ closeActionUrl: !closeActionUrl, enterActionUrl: !enterActionUrl, }) } > Close Notification this.setState({ closeActionUrl: !closeActionUrl, enterActionUrl: !enterActionUrl, }) } > Enter Redirect URL {enterActionUrl && (
)}
))}
this.setState({ background: !background })} > Background {background && (
this.setState({ ImageUpload: !ImageUpload, ImageUrl: !ImageUrl, }) } > Upload Image this.setState({ ImageUpload: !ImageUpload, ImageUrl: !ImageUrl, }) } > Enter URL {ImageUrl && (
)} {ImageUpload && (
)}
)}
this.setState({ background: !background })} > Background {foreground && (
this.setState({ FgImageUpload: !FgImageUpload, FgImageUrl: !FgImageUrl, }) } > Upload Image this.setState({ FgImageUpload: !FgImageUpload, FgImageUrl: !FgImageUrl, }) } > Enter URL {FgImageUrl && (
)} {FgImageUpload && (
)}
)}
{ this.setState({ advance: !advance }) }} > Include Close Button
Continue this.props.history.goBack()} className="float grey-border" > Go Back

) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepTwo)
